physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mild facial dysmorphic features including short palpebral fissures and a short philtrum. Deformed digits noted on the left hand.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At 23 months: Severe growth retardation observed with a length of 72 cm (<3rd centile), weight of 8.5 kg (<3rd centile), and head circumference of 46 cm (<3rd centile). Multiple facial dysmorphic features now include a narrow mouth with a thin upper lip, maxillary hypoplasia, and prognathism. Patient walking independently on tiptoes with walking instability related to knee flexion and popliteal ligament tightness. Complete syndactyly of fingers 3-4 with fusion of the bones in the left hand identified. Right testicle descended into scrotum; left testicle not descended.
